verses.verse: And in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> thou shalt say, <WH559> O LORD, <WH3068> I will praise <WH3034> thee: though <WH3588> thou wast angry <WH599> with me, thine anger <WH639> is turned away, <WH7725> and thou comfortedst <WH5162> me.

Behold, <WH2009> God <WH410> is my salvation; <WH3444> I will trust, <WH982> and not <WH3808> be afraid: <WH6342> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3050> JEHOVAH <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my song; <WH2176> he also is become <WH1961> my salvation. <WH3444>
Therefore with joy <WH8342> shall ye draw <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the wells <WH4480> <WH4599> of salvation. <WH3444>

And in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall ye say, <WH559> Praise <WH3034> the LORD, <WH3068> call <WH7121> upon his name, <WH8034> declare <WH3045> his doings <WH5949> among the people, <WH5971> make mention <WH2142> that <WH3588> his name <WH8034> is exalted. <WH7682>
Sing <WH2167> unto the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> he hath done <WH6213> excellent things: <WH1348> this <WH2063> is known <WH3045> in all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
Cry out <WH6670> and shout, <WH7442> thou inhabitant <WH3427> of Zion: <WH6726> for <WH3588> great <WH1419> is the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478> in the midst <WH7130> of thee.
